Written while drinking water
during the week of August 18, 2019
Internet Magic, Sports, Weekvlogs? | #31

I really miss the old internet (I was born in the 90s so when I say the old internet, I mean the internet in the early 2000s). I think part of this feeling is just pure nostalgic, but part of it is because I think we are in a different time. Today‚Äôs internet is focused on consuming information. I think there were also technical constraints that also happened to make it less possible for us to be constantly distracted.
